items.title: Colts’ Jonathan Taylor AFC Offensive Player of the Week
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – The honors keep flowing in for Jonathan Taylor. Taylor rushed 32 times for 244 yards and three touchdowns and added three receptions for [...]

items.title: Jonathan Taylor nominated for Week 10 FedEx Ground Player of the Week

items.title: Statement from the Indianapolis Colts
Colts’ follow record-setting Jonathan Taylor to OT win over Falcons in Berlin’s historic Olympic Stadium
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – The Indianapolis Colts went international. Jonathan Taylor went off. “Look,’’ said Zaire Franklin. “I’ll scream it from the mountaintops. “He’s the MVP in my book.’’ “It’s phenomenal the way he’s been running,’’ added Shane Steichen. In the NFL’s first game at Berlin’s historic Olympic Stadium on Sunday, Taylor’s brilliance carried the Colts when [...]

items.title: Sauce Gardner makes immediate impact in Colts debut

items.title: Jonathan Taylor takes historic season to international stage with 3-touchdown, record-breaking, walk-off performance vs. Falcons

items.title: Taylor's touchdown in overtime propels Colts over Falcons in Berlin

Taylor had a monster day on the ground, gaining 244 yards and scoring three touchdowns as the Colts are now 8-2 and in the [...]

items.title: Jonathan Taylor's historic game fuels Colts' thrilling OT win vs. Falcons
items.summary: Taylor rushed for three touchdowns – including an 83-yarder in the fourth quarter and the game-winner in overtime – to set a new franchise record and propel the Colts to victory.
